critAlertDetails.query:
//critical root mount on linux
 Perf
 | where CounterName has '% used space' and Computer in ((Heartbeat | where OSType has 'linux' | distinct Computer))
 | where Computer !startswith 'hn'and Computer !startswith 'wn' and Computer !startswith 'zk' and Computer !startswith 'k8s' and Computer !startswith 'aks'
 | where isnotempty(_ResourceId)
 | where ObjectName has 'Logical Disk' and CounterName has '% used space' and InstanceName == '/'
 | project Computer, InstanceName, CounterValue
 | summarize PercentUsed=round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Computer, InstanceName
 | project Computer, InstanceName, PercentUsed
 | where PercentUsed >= 90
 | join (Perf
 | where CounterName has 'free megabytes' and Computer in ((Heartbeat | where OSType has 'linux' | distinct Computer))
 ) on InstanceName, Computer
 | project Computer, InstanceName, CounterValue, PercentUsed
 | summarize averageGigabytesFree=round((avg(CounterValue)/1024),2) by Computer, InstanceName, PercentUsed
 | project Computer, InstanceName, ["Average GB Free"]=averageGigabytesFree, ["Precent Used"]=PercentUsed
 | where ["Average GB Free"] <= 10

critAlertDetails.alertDescription: [concat('Critical Data Mount Alert on Linux. ', parameters('version'))]
critAlertDetails.query:
//critical data mount on linux
 Perf
 | where CounterName has '% used space' and Computer in ((Heartbeat | where OSType has 'linux' | distinct Computer))
 | where Computer !startswith 'hn'and Computer !startswith 'wn' and Computer !startswith 'zk' and Computer !startswith 'k8s' and Computer !startswith 'aks'
 | where isnotempty(_ResourceId)
 | where InstanceName !has '_total' and InstanceName !contains '/mnt/resource' and InstanceName != '/'
 | project Computer, InstanceName, CounterValue
 | summarize PercentUsed=round(avg(CounterValue),2) by Computer, InstanceName
 | project Computer, InstanceName, PercentUsed
 | where PercentUsed >= 95
 | join (Perf
 | where CounterName has 'free megabytes' and Computer in ((Heartbeat | where OSType has 'linux' | distinct Computer))
 ) on InstanceName, Computer
 | project Computer, InstanceName, CounterValue, PercentUsed
 | summarize averageGigabytesFree=round((avg(CounterValue)/1024),2) by Computer, InstanceName, PercentUsed
 | project Computer, InstanceName, ["Average GB Free"]=averageGigabytesFree, ["Percent Used"]=PercentUsed
 | where ["Average GB Free"] <= 10
